name: Custom Full Colour Zombie Portrait
description:
*The portrait shown is an example of my work. The portrait you receive will be based on the photo you send to me.*

What you get:
-- An original, custom 10"x12" Zombie Portrait in FULL COLOUR created Christopher Williams

-- This is not a digitally drawn or manipulated photo, nor is it a print of an original.

-- Each piece is done by hand and stands as an original artwork signed and dated by Christopher Williams.

-- Images mailed in a safe and efficient manner so as not to get bent or wrinkled during shipping!


--------------------------------------------

The ordering process:
--Inquire with any special requests prior to placing your order.
-- Checkout through PayPal.
-- Once you have finished the checkout process, email your photograph (details about photo type can be found in the FAQ section) to Chris: binaryconsciousness [!at] gmail.com with your name, Etsy, and “custom zombie portrait” in the subject line.
-- You will receive an email confirming your order.

Your artwork should arrive in 2-3 weeks from confirmation.

Cheers!

name: Skulloons
description:
Each Skulloon is lovingly hand rendered on a 8x17 piece of acid free archival illustration paper. Each one is unique and hand signed and dated by the artist.

For custom sizes or in different media contact Chris at

Binaryconsciousness@gmail.com
